last_episode_to_air.name: On the Brink
last_episode_to_air.overview: Time's up, and it's a frantic race to find the gold. The team is at a crossroads when Adam drops a bomb that divides opinions. It's a final grasp at gold and glory before winter bears down and they're frozen out.

name: Curse of the Frozen Gold
overview: In the treacherous wilds of British Columbia, six prospectors pursue a cursed cache of gold worth billions. With just a few short weeks to complete their mission, they'll combine their skills to find the fortune, or fall victim to the curse.

episodes.name: Waking the Curse
episodes.overview: In the treacherous wilds of British Columbia, six prospectors pursue a cursed cache of gold worth billions. With just a few short weeks to complete their mission, they'll combine their skills to find the fortune, or fall victim to the curse.

episodes.name: Aliens on Terrarosa
episodes.overview: Adam and Evan take on the Terrarosa Glacier, and a mysterious force that nearly killed a local prospector. Daryl takes Danny into Spindle Canyon, uncovering the ghostly remnants of past explorers along with promising signs of gold.

episodes.name: Ghosts from the Past
episodes.overview: The ghosts of past prospectors haunt the team, and mysterious clues divide opinions as the group searches and struggles to find the exact location of Slumach's gold.

episodes.name: Weathering the Storm
episodes.overview: A mysterious map marked with dollar signs points the team towards another potential location. A startling discovery throws the team in disarray, exposing hidden fractures as the first real rains of the season set in.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: Daryl's got new info about gold on the Terrarosa Glacier, but he'll only reveal it if he can tag along with Adam and Evan. Fred gets a mysterious call from a prospector who says he's found Slumach's gold and sets out with Don and Danny.

episodes.name: On the Brink
episodes.overview: Time's up, and it's a frantic race to find the gold. The team is at a crossroads when Adam drops a bomb that divides opinions. It's a final grasp at gold and glory before winter bears down and they're frozen out.
